item.title: Air, wind and roses
item.description: Letâ€™s take a look at some air pollution data stored in an Excel file. Download the data DOWNLOAD â€” La Jolla PM25 data

item.title: Compare years
item.description: Looking for change ðŸ“‰ðŸ“ˆ Looking for change ðŸ“‰ðŸ“ˆ Letâ€™s compare the observations at a monitoring site for different years. For this example, we will see if we can detect a shift in concentrations after a new highway project was completed.

item.title: Day 1 - AM

item.title: Get started
item.description: Trial - Dip your toes in your browser Online courses MDH examples scripts Recordings Learn R from inside R Book reading Training Trial - Dip your toes in your browser Intro to R (with very cute giraffes) Short RStudio lessons: R programming basics

item.title: GIS and Shapefiles
item.description: The sf package Quick plots Transform coordinates Centroids Area calculations with st_area() Interactive map with leaflet Distance calculations with st_distance() Download Census data American Community Survey (ACS) The sf package The sf (simple features) package can read and save shapefiles, and it plays nicely with the dpylr functions youâ€™ve been learning.

item.title: Help!
item.description: Cheatsheets Use cheatsheets to refresh your memory and find new functions or plots. In RStudio go to Help > Cheatsheets Data Transformation :: Helpful functions for cleaning and arranging your data.

item.title: Install & Update
item.description: Install R Install RStudio Install R packages Add R packages Update R packages Install R The R language and its tools are built by people from around the world.

item.title: Jakku scrap economy
item.description: Remember what you should do first when you start your R session? First we load the packages we will need.

item.title: Porg biomonitoring data
item.description: # load packages library(readr) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) Start by reading in the Porg data. porg_data <- read_csv("https://itep-r.netlify.com/data/Porg_samples.csv") Take a couple of minutes to get an overview of the data.

item.title: R community
item.description: The growth of R user groups worldwide Online Communities #rstats on Twitter RStudioâ€™s question forum R Weekly shares weekly highlights from across the R world R Ladies meetups R Ladies Global Twitter R for data science learning community

item.title: R Training | Analysis Outline
item.description: Youâ€™re ready to blast off on your own. The example outline below includes some placeholder code based on ozone measurements and is presented as a helpful starting point for your analysis.
